header.name: Muhammet Enes Çetin
header.description: JR. Frontend Developer Based In Türkiye.

resume.title: ABOUT
resume.description:
I graduated from Ankara University with a degree in Computer Programming in 2022. Currently, I am focused on developing Frontend Web applications using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React.js, Next.js 14, and TypeScript. My journey in software development has been driven by a deep curiosity and a passion for continuous learning. With every step I take and every new piece of information I acquire, my desire to explore and understand more grows stronger.

As a Frontend Web Developer, I thrive on researching new technologies and meticulously studying documentation. I am committed to honing my skills and staying updated with the latest advancements in the field. I am always eager to embrace new challenges and expand my knowledge.
